title: Space Waves

controls: Ascend: Hold the spacebar or left mouse button Descend: Release the spacebar or left mouse button
Hold down your finger to rise, release to fall.
content.howToPlay: Guide your wave through futuristic neon landscapes, dodge obstacles, and collect stars to boost your score.Unlike Geometry Dash, you'll move in a zigzag pattern this time. If you hold the button, the wave will go upward.If you release the button, the waves will move downward.In case you need to go straight in a thigh corridor, click or tap quickly and repeatedly to create small zigzag movements.Made a mistake? It's okay. A time reversal feature gives you a second chance to get back on track.Complete two worlds, each including ten difficult levels.At the beginning, you can pick the first two levels of each world. You need to unlock the rest by completing previous levels.

fullContent: Home› AvoidSpace WavesBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenRide the waves of the galaxy in Space Waves! In this online game, similar to Geometry Dash, you'll pilot a spacecraft through mesmerizing neon landscapes, dodging spikes, walls and other obstacles and collecting coins as you race through two vibrant worlds. With 20 levels of increasing difficulty, your reflexes will be tested to the max. The heart-pumping soundtrack adds so much to the gameplay that you will feel like you are drawing the beats! Your ink? It's the waves you left behind with your spacecraft. So let's see the skilled gamers, game on!ControlsComputerAscend: Hold the spacebar or left mouse button Descend: Release the spacebar or left mouse button MobileHold down your finger to rise, release to fall.How to Play Space WavesGuide your wave through futuristic neon landscapes, dodge obstacles, and collect stars to boost your score.Unlike Geometry Dash, you'll move in a zigzag pattern this time. If you hold the button, the wave will go upward.If you release the button, the waves will move downward.In case you need to go straight in a thigh corridor, click or tap quickly and repeatedly to create small zigzag movements.Made a mistake? It's okay. A time reversal feature gives you a second chance to get back on track.Complete two worlds, each including ten difficult levels.At the beginning, you can pick the first two levels of each world. You need to unlock the rest by completing previous levels.Space Waves Game FeaturesTwo unique worlds with 10 levels eachCustomizable wave with appearance and color optionsNeon-inspired environments and dynamic musicSimple one-handed controlsMore Dash GamesIf you enjoyed Space Wave, check out other Dash games like Geometry Jump. The pace is even more faster than space waves but it has a reversed control mechanism. Play it on OnlineGames.io and let us know in the comments which dash game you liked more. This article was updated on January 28, 20251 Player2DActionArcadeAvoidCrazyFreeMobileMouseSkillSpace
